title: Phase transition properties: Normal melting temperature

sample: de-gassed by evacuation;dried by vacuum heating

ref.full: Musial, M.; Wojnarowska, Z.; Cheng, S.; Ngai, K. L.; Paluch, M. (2019) J. Phys. Chem. C 123(36), 22089-22094.
